hero.description: Plan, design and order greenspaces inside, outside and on top of buildings<1/>-<3> all in one place.</3>

section_two.title: SquareRoot makes cities <1>green</1>, literally!
section_two.description: At SquareRoot, we believe sustainable cities are <1>our future</1>. With lots of green spaces inside, outside and top of buildings.

section_three.title: We want to make it easier to <1>choose nature</1> for your building projects.
section_three.description: Together with NIBIO, biologists, landscape architects and plant nurseries we have developed plant lists for urban greening and standard concepts, such as roof gardens and rain beds, to manage heavy rainfall and to increase biodiversity.

section_four.title: Choose from our plant packages for your project

description.line_tree: and plant nurseries we are constantly developing new plant packages that are adapted to various types of green spaces like:

section_four.summary: We’re working on offering more packages based on various climates and regions. Get in touch if you want to contribute to new plant packages!
section_four.rooftop_description: Optimise your roof surface with one of our <1>rooftop</1> concepts. Our plants and hardware are chosen and designed to meet your specific needs.
section_four.rainbed_description: Our plants for <1>rainbeds</1> are carefully chosen with plants for the wet-zone, able to stand up to 48 hours in the water and drought tolerant plants at the borders, the dry-zone.

section_five.description: By integrating nature in your project, it helps meet the requirements for stormwater management and using local plants increases <1>biodiversity</1> as well as <3>BREEAM points</3>. <5 /> <6 /> Building projects with a high environmental footprint increases the value of your property and <8>keeps our cities healthy</8>.

section_six.title: Our platform
section_six.description: Our digital platform makes it easy to find and order the best adapted plants for your project. <1/> <2/> Thanks to our network of local plant nurseries we help you to find the right plants for your space. Our database builds on the assortment from local plant nurseries but if you don’t find the plant you wish, you can also put in a special request.<4 /> <5 /> We make sure that what you plan for is also what you actually get! <7 /> <8 />Sign in the platform and start browsing for plants and packages!

footer.description: We are the new platform for green spaces

who_page.title: Who we are
who_page.description: Looking for plants to create amazing and resilient urban green areas? Unsure about compliance and availability of these plants? SquareRoot is there to solve this for you! <1/> <2/>Here you can find and choose plants adapted to your project and requirements either by using filters on our database or choosing from our plant packages that are specially suited for certain functionalities and green space types. In collaboration with local plant nurseries we make sure the plants you select will be available.<4/><5/>Our goal is to make it easier to integrate locally produced plants and plants of local origin into urban green spaces. Our starting point is the assortment of plants available at local plant nurseries, and we are also helping the producers adapt to the demand that is constantly evolving.<7/> <8/> Together we will green our cities!<10/>

team.title: The Roots
team.support: We are so grateful they helped us build SquareRoot:
team.michel_d: A lover of nature and the outdoors, <1>Michel</1> is passionate about the environment and contributing to solving climate change.<3/><4/>Priori to SquareRoot he co-founded BiomimicryNorway, an NGO dedicated to educating people and companies about sustainable innovation inspired by nature. He has spent a great deal of energy helping various startups and initiatives in the past years using his many skills ranging from design to business modelling for Circular Economy.
team.marie_d: A citizen of the world and animal enthusiast who loves an indoor and outdoor jungle. Marie is committed to people and the environment and has extensive experience in project management. <1/><2/> Contributing to a low-carbon economy is dear to Marie. She has several areas of interest and expertise going from nature preservation, circular economy, social entrepreneurship and animal welfare. <4 /> <5 /> These led her to create Lille Åsen Skogshage where she is currently testing out her passion for nature by creating a big edible forest adapted to the norwegian climate.
team.greg_d: Greg is a technology enthusiast who wants to keep focus on sustainability.<1 /> <2 /> SquareRoot gives him the chance to combine those two to have a positive impact on our society. His core competencies revolve around data analysis, machine learning and cloud technologies. He puts emphasis on automated processes, reliable delivery and extracting insights that give value.
team.karolina_d: The undefeated champion of shilly-shally, eating veggie burgers and having too many ideas at once, <1>Karolina</1> always aims at perfection. SquareRoot gave her a chance for following her passion and working towards a meaningful purpose that starts a positive change in the world we live in. <3/><4/> Apart from pursuing an engineering degree in IT and loving to look through everyone's data, she enjoys a good workout - or a good book - out in the nature. <6/>
team.gro_d: A wannabe scientist, but currently just a curious girl with a heart for people, nature and delicious homemade food, <1>Gro</1> loves to explore and learn from the world and its inhabitants. At SquareRoot, she takes our grand vision, breaks it down to the basics, then puts it back together in a design we all can work on. This way, she hopes that our platform will be a driving force towards user-friendly cities, for both humans and nature. <3/><4/> Aside of her bachelor’s in computer engineering, she practices yoga and martial arts. With this, she aims to face any challenge that may come her way.
team.kristian_d: With us as an intern, <1>Kristian</1> is motivated to make our platform as user-friendly and self-driven as possible, which in turn will hopefully make the process of including green spaces in our cities a simple task.<3/><4/> He is an aspiring Software Developer, currently a Computer Engineering student at OsloMet. Apart from his studies, he enjoys being in the outdoors year around, where you can find him far up in the steep mountains.
team.sanne_d: <0>Sanne</0> is passionate about the environment and animals and wants to create a more sustainable way of living. She joined Squareroot to contribute to a greener future with our ecological solution. <2/> <3/>  She enjoys being near the ocean with good company and delicious food. She is finishing her last year of her bachelor degree in Applied Computer Science at Oslo Metropolitan University.

contact_page.accept2: I want to occasionally receive newsletters from SquareRoot about offers, news and updates in green urban development

partner_page.title: Become a partner
partner_page.subtitle: Together, we green our cities.
partner_page.description: We want to collaborate with all stakeholders in the planning and design of urban green areas. This is so that we can make the work process seamless so that you can create and maintain resilient greenspaces.
partner_page.RED_d: See the concepts that will green you building
partner_page.LARK_d: See what is available and make your own amazing project
partner_page.LENT_d: Order the right plant for the right spot on our platform
partner_page.PN_d: Show and sell your plants on our platform

Rooftop.title: Roof Garden
Rooftop.description: Optimize your roof surface with one our concepts. <1/><2/>Roofs can be used for energy production, stormwater management, increase biodiversity or to create a space for people to meet, relax and enjoy.<4/><5/>Our concepts maximize these benefits and consider weight restrictions of your roof using light weight rooftop soils.  Our plants and hardware are chosen and designed to meet your specific needs.

Rainbeds.title: Rainbed
Rainbeds.description: A rainbed stores rainwater runoff from roofs and other hard surfaces.   Keeping the water out of the sewage system when it rains hard reduces the risk of floods. <1/><2/>Our plants for this urban green space are carefully chosen with plants for the wet-zone, able to stand up to 48 hours in the water and drought tolerant plants at the borders, the dry-zone.    <3/><4/>It is an efficient tool to manage stormwater, improve biodiversity and the attractiveness of our cities.

Indoor.title: Indoor Plants
Indoor.description: Creating cities where people love to live and work means greening inside buildings as well.  Indoor plants clean the air and have a positive effect on our wellbeing.  Building standards like WELL actively promote integrating plants indoor.  <3/><4/>  Our partner Leaf has extensive expertise with indoor plants.  Netflix’ offices in Amsterdam are just one of their amazing projects.  Incredible aesthetics are combined with minimal maintenance.<5/><6/>Plants are grown in modular rectangular tray directly at the nursery and make it easy for the interior architect to design and integrate green jungles in buildings.

single_category.general_info: On our platform, you will be able to put together concepts in a project and order it through our website.<1/><2/> The plantlist is countinously updated.

error_page.title: Oops... We didn't find what you were looking for
